A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After TFA\, I was kind of worried that nuWars would supplant Star Wars in peoples' hearts and minds. Would the Resistance replace The Rebellion? Would the First Order replace the Empire? Would BB-8 replace R2?\n\nAfter the dumpster fire that was TLJ I realized I need not have worried. Rian Johnson took what was a guaranteed home run\, and tripped over his own dick. Instead of a movie\, I got a 2+ hour PSA on feminist and anti-capitalist ideology - from the freaking evil empire Disney no less!
